site_name: Hawkesley House, 400 Hoe Street, Walthamstow, London, E17 9SX
description: Variation of condition 2 (Approved Plans) attached to planning permission reference 142872 granted 25/11/16 to allow for the following amendments: -        Amendments to the basement location at the lower ground, resulting in reduction of the floor area of commercial unit (lower floor level) and increase in the storage area for lower level units (Flats 19, 20 and 21) -        Replacement of a window in the side elevation with patio door for access to private amenity area (Flat 26) -        Added external gas meter room enclosure -        Alteration to balcony layout with privacy screens installed   As part of this application, ground level details were submitted for the removal of Condition 8 of planning permission 142872.
